name: Cappuchino Spoontforce Deluxe VI - Girl of the Boiling Fury
name_original: Cappuchino Spoontforce Deluxe VI - Girl of the Boiling Fury
description:
Hurl sugar cubes at a girl bathing in coffee... She's had better baths.

A Gameboy-style arcade game about the short tempered girl Sajiko trying her best to enjoy a relaxing bath in a cup of coffee.
Try adding as many ingredients to the Coffee as possible, without letting it get cold.
Hitting Sajiko with Milk and Sugar awards bonus points for your highscore, but it will make her angry, so let her calm down before she snaps.

Her friends call her Spoont by the way.

Made for the GameGirl Jam.

CONTROLS: 
Z/Y, X, Up, Down, P
Switch your ingredients with X, use them with Z/Y.
Pause with P.
